page.title: 19A MINISTER'S WORK, SOUTH-AYR
page.content: The{Reverend M. Dickie}of Castlehill Parish Church works on average 78 hours per. week. Travelling round on his bicycle, he visits homes, schools and hospitals. He ministers to anyone who needs him whether or not they attend church. On Sundays he conducts morning and evening services in the church. His church is also used by many groups from the community including Boys' Brigade,Girl Guides and Mothers' Groups. {Reverend Father J. Connolly}also plays an important role in the community. He is parish priest for all the catholics in South-Ayr. He says Mass daily in his church and there are two services on Saturdays and Sundays. He also runs many groups in the church.
